mathlib3D
Class MatrixInvert

java.lang.Object
  mathlib3D.MatrixInvert
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class MatrixInvert
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class is a helper class supporting the Matrix3D class; it is not intended to be used directly. To obtain the inverse of a Matrix3D object, use the method inverse() in the Matrix3D class. the code for this class was based on the source code of Matrix4d.java of the vecmath package in Java3D, written by Kenji Hiranabe of Eiwa System Management,Inc.

See Also:

set

public final void set(double[] m)
Sets the values in this Matrix4d equal to the row-major array parameter (ie, the first four elements of the array will be copied into the first row of this matrix, etc.).
